languages.text: "Мы нуждаемся во вместилище. В теле. Но очень немногое может вместить нас. Вот почему мы пришли просить. Магос Асклепий предложил свою оболочку в дар. Она может подойти".
"We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."
languages.original_text: "Мы нуждаемся во вместилище. В теле. Но очень немногое может вместить нас. Вот почему мы пришли просить. Магос Асклепий предложил свою оболочку в дар. Она может подойти".

traits.locale_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."
"We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."
"We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."
"We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."
"We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

languages.text: 「我々には船が必要だ。本体が。しかし我々を収容できるものなど滅多にない。だからあなたにお願いに来た。マゴス・アスクレピオスが我々に彼のシェルを提供してくれた。これなら十分なはずだ」
languages.original_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

traits.locale_text: 「我々には船が必要だ。本体が。しかし我々を収容できるものなど滅多にない。だからあなたにお願いに来た。マゴス・アスクレピオスが我々に彼のシェルを提供してくれた。これなら十分なはずだ」

languages.text: “我们需要一个容器，一个躯壳，但几乎没有什么东西能容纳我们，这正是我们来找你的原因。阿斯克勒庇俄斯贤者愿意把他的躯壳提供给我们，或许这可以满足我们的需求。”
languages.original_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

traits.locale_text: “我们需要一个容器，一个躯壳，但几乎没有什么东西能容纳我们，这正是我们来找你的原因。阿斯克勒庇俄斯贤者愿意把他的躯壳提供给我们，或许这可以满足我们的需求。”

languages.text: "Wir brauchen ein Gefäß. Einen Körper. Doch nur wenige Dinge können uns beherbergen. Darum sind wir gekommen, um Euch zu fragen. Magos Asclepius hat uns seine Hülle angeboten. Sie könnte genügen."
languages.original_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

traits.locale_text: "Wir brauchen ein Gefäß. Einen Körper. Doch nur wenige Dinge können uns beherbergen. Darum sind wir gekommen, um Euch zu fragen. Magos Asclepius hat uns seine Hülle angeboten. Sie könnte genügen."

languages.text: « Nous avons besoin d'un hôte à notre mesure, mais peu de choses conviennent. C'est pourquoi nous vous sollicitons aujourd'hui. Le magos Asclépios nous fait don de son corps. Il pourrait faire l'affaire. »
languages.original_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons besoin d'un hôte à notre mesure, mais peu de choses conviennent. C'est pourquoi nous vous sollicitons aujourd'hui. Le magos Asclépios nous fait don de son corps. Il pourrait faire l'affaire. »

languages.text: «Necesitamos un soporte físico. Un cuerpo. Pero existen muy pocas cosas que sean capaces de albergarnos. Por eso hemos acudido a usted. El magos Asclepius nos ha ofrecido su envoltura física. Podría servir».
languages.original_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

traits.locale_text: «Necesitamos un soporte físico. Un cuerpo. Pero existen muy pocas cosas que sean capaces de albergarnos. Por eso hemos acudido a usted. El magos Asclepius nos ha ofrecido su envoltura física. Podría servir».

languages.text: "Bir konağa, vücuda ihtiyacımız var. Bizi barındırabilecek varlıkların sayısı ise oldukça sınırlı. Bu yüzden sizden bir şey rica etmeye geldik. Magos Asclepius, kabuğunu bize sundu. İşimizi görecektir."
languages.original_text: "We need a vessel. A body. But very few things can house us. That is why we have come to ask you. Magos Asclepius has offered his shell to us. It might do."

traits.locale_text: "Bir konağa ihtiyacımız var. Bir vücuda. Ancak bizi barındırabilecek varlıkların sayısı oldukça sınırlı. Bu yüzden sizden bir şey rica etmeye geldik. Magos Asclepius kabuğunu bize sundu. İşimizi görecektir."
